name: cpulimit
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "cpulimit" %}
{% set version = "0.2" %}
{% set sha256 = "64312f9ac569ddcadb615593cd002c94b76e93a0d4625d3ce1abb49e08e2c2da" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/opsengine/{{ name }}/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - libtool
    - toolchain

  run:

about:
  home: https://github.com/opsengine/cpulimit
  license: GPL-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: CPU usage limiter for Linux

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - keuv-grvl
